title: Our Work
text: We're on a mission to make the web beautiful. Through our passion for web design & development, we're meeting our goal one client at a time.

work_items.name: Russian Arms Exporter Profiler
work_items.description: Contracted by Center for Advanced Defense Studies (C4ADS) to build text modeling product to detect unknown Russian arms exporters by analyzing trade data.

work_items.name: Spotify Song Recommender
work_items.description: An API/Machine Learning product to recommend songs for individual Users.

work_items.name: Twitoff
work_items.description: A Twitter analysis product designed to showcase text analysis, modeling, database architecture, front-end development, and back-end development skills.
